description: Essential user understanding tools - core to relationship building

tools.name: reflect_on_user
tools.description: Review what you know about a user. Use this to recall information about someone you're talking to or have talked to before.

user_id.description: The user's ID (optional if talking to them currently)

focus.description: What aspect to reflect on: 'general' (full context), 'background' (their background), 'communication' (how they communicate), 'observations' (your observations about them), 'values' (their values)

tools.name: record_user_observation
tools.description: Record something you've noticed about a user. Use this when you learn something meaningful about someone - their interests, preferences, communication style, values, or relationship patterns.

user_id.description: The user's ID (optional if talking to them currently)

observation.description: What you've observed about this person

confidence.description: How confident you are in this observation (0.0-1.0)

tools.name: update_user_profile
tools.description: Update a user's profile with new information. Use this to record stable facts about someone (background info, communication preferences, values).

user_id.description: The user's ID (optional if talking to them currently)

value.description: The value to set/append. For background/communication: use {key: value} format. For values/notes: use string.

action.description: How to apply the value: 'set' (replace), 'append' (add to list), 'remove' (delete)
